item.description:
CHANGE IN MEETUP!!!!!

Hi everyone:

I am so sorry for changing the TIME on this meetup, but there is a scheduling conflict. I have changed the time to 10am. I know this is early for a Sunday morning and hope this does not effect your attendance at meetup.

Again the meetup will still be on Sunday, April 19th, BUT at 10am (not the previously scheduled 1pm). Please forgive me!!!!!!

Hope to see you all there!
item.name: 2nd Pug Meet-up this month
